snippet: The Alibaba Group is working on a complex plan to buy back most of Yahoo's stake in the company, and using Alibaba.com could remove an additional complication.
abstract: The Alibaba Group is working on a complex plan to buy back most of Yahoo's stake in the company, and using Alibaba.com could remove an additional complication.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and EVELYN M. RUSLI

lead_paragraph: The Alibaba Group's publicly traded affiliate, Alibaba.com, has emerged as a potential part of its plan to buy back most of a stake held by Yahoo, people briefed on the matter said on Thursday.

headline.main: Alibaba.com May Become Part of Deal With Yahoo
